      • testItemExistence

        public boolean testItemExistence(org.hibernate.Session session,
                        java.lang.String parent,
                        java.lang.String name)
                          throws org.hibernate.HibernateException,
                                 DatabaseException
        Check for same node name in same parent
        参数:
        Session - Hibernate session.
        parent - Parent node uuid.
        name - Name of the child node to test.
        返回:
        true if child item exists or false otherwise.
        抛出:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException
        DatabaseException
